name: Bit Orchard (itch) (2Boone)
description:
You've always dreamt about owning an apple orchard and now you've finally purchased one! The only issue is it's a little run down and needs some work!

Pull weeds, plant seeds and chase the crows away from your apples! Earn money to upgrade your house and expand your land in this charming pixel art farming game!

You can also fish, help out the villagers and shop at the little town store!

The graphics are inspired by the original Gameboy and the controls are super simple!
